statements: SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, payment_method FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT id, cvv FROM customer_payments WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM customer_payments ORDER BY customer_id DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT id, customer_id, payment_method FROM customer_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS num_payments FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(LENGTH(card_number)) AS avg_card_length FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_card_length > 12;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT card_number, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, card_expiry_date FROM customer_payments ORDER BY card_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'Successful';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id IN (100, 200) ORDER BY customer_id DESC, payment_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, card_number, card_expiry_date FROM customer_payments WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM customer_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 1000
SELECT customer_id, card_number, card_expiry_date, payment_amount FROM customer_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.customer_id, th.transaction_date, th.transaction_amount, th.transaction_status, cp.card_number FROM transaction_history th INNER JOIN customer_payments cp ON th.customer_id = cp.customer_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentCards WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM TransactionHistory ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PaymentCards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM CustomerDetails JOIN TransactionHistory ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = TransactionHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM CustomerDetails JOIN PaymentCards ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = PaymentCards.customer_id WHERE PaymentCards.cvv = '123';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction FROM TransactionHistory GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_transaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_id FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT card_number, card_expiry_date FROM card_details WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_id FROM customer_details WHERE email_id LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT card_id, customer_id, card_number FROM card_details WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, card_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT method_type, method_description FROM payment_method;
SELECT * FROM payment WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM payment WHERE amount > 1000) ORDER BY customer_email;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.payment_id, t.status FROM transaction t INNER JOIN payment p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE t.status = 'processed';
SELECT ph.payment_id, c.customer_name, ph.payment_amount FROM payment_history ph INNER JOIN customer c ON ph.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE ph.payment_amount > 500 ORDER BY ph.payment_date ASC;
